name: Magicians' Souls
desc:
You can send up to 2 Spells/Traps from your hand and/or field to the GY; draw the same number of cards you sent to the GY. If this card is in your hand: You can send 1 Level 6 or higher Spellcaster monster from your Deck to the GY, then activate 1 of the following effects;
● Special Summon this card from your hand.
● Send this card to the GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your GY.
You can only use each effect of "Magicians' Souls" once per turn.
str4: Send this card to the GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your GY
str5: Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your GY?
